item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Snippet author? pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:15, topic:528700”]no

and

[quote author=LilXCj link=topic=647454.msg4354585#msg4354585 date=1377268465]

I don’t see why tutorial author wouldn’t fit under snippets ?

It’s just somebody who makes guides in general no matter how small/easy/hard/long

I mean the only way I could ever see something like this really being produced would be if somebody makes literally hundreds of snippets actually worth something. (which is fairly rare)

If someone got tutorial author because of “quality” snippets, I will shoot myself.

[/quote][/quote]yet its not tut author what i suggested.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Snippet author? pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I think it’s a bit superfluous, as there’s already a Tutorial Author badge. A snippet is in a very vague way a subset of a tutorial imo.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Snippet author? pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:10, topic:528700”][quote author=Java-RSPS-Noob link=topic=647454.msg4354589#msg4354589 date=1377269064]
You don’t know what the reason is he got it though.

It isn’t just Arham either, I see several snippets from Primadude/Clawz Fury as well.
[/quote]tutorials are just thoroughly explained snippets. if the poster doesn’t care to explain in-depth, it’s a snippet. if they take time to explain it, it’s a tutorial.[/quote]I understand that, but my point is that most helpful snippets are already by the tutorial authors so making a separate badge is kind of ludicrous.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Snippet author? pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:5, topic:528700”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=647454.msg4354585#msg4354585 date=1377268465]

I don’t see why tutorial author wouldn’t fit under snippets ?

It’s just somebody who makes guides in general no matter how small/easy/hard/long

I mean the only way I could ever see something like this really being produced would be if somebody makes literally hundreds of snippets actually worth something. (which is fairly rare)

If someone got tutorial author because of “quality” snippets, I will shoot myself.

I disagree with this idea simply because I believe tutorial author should be reserved for well-thought, helpful tutorials that not only expand a user’s way of thinking while programming but assists a user in solving a problem s/he couldn’t solve before.
[/quote]

hands you a gun shoot away

There are several snippets by Arham for instance[/quote]

But those are not the reason why Arham got tutorial author.

Read full topic
